messages.message:
:warning:  Updates to `server-nginx` and `envoy-proxy` docker images :warning:

• Platform engineering is working on porting our service images to Chainguard to address the numerous CVEs introduced by Ubuntu 
• The first of these image updates will be merged in PR-62746 (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/62746) and PR-62846 (https://github.com/instabase/instabase/pull/62846)
• We will be monitoring for any related failures, however please reach out in <#C02FSR83JMQ|> with any questions or concerns!
@Aaron Tami / @Cody Boggs / @Abhinav / @astpierre / @Kerry
This is great!!! Looking forward to this.
